mapper.select: select u.user_id userId,u.username,u.dept_id deptId,u.email,u.mobile, u.status,u.ssex,ur.role_id roleId from t_user u left join t_user_role ur on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT U .USERNAME, U .USER_ID userId, D .DEPT_NAME deptName, U .mobile, U .email, U .avatar, U .description, U .ssex, U .dept_id deptId, listagg (r.role_name, 'ï¼Œ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY r.role_id) AS roleName FROM t_user U LEFT JOIN t_dept D ON U .DEPT_ID = D .DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER_ROLE ur ON U .user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE U .USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY U .username, D .dept_name, U .mobile, U .email, U .avatar, U .description, U .ssex, U .USER_ID, U .dept_id
